name: Drag Deal
description:
Drag Deal is a multiplayer game where you can play with your friends or other players online!
It is a Casual game with minigames, currently with Rhythm minigame.

Available minigame Rythm, hit the notes at the right time to earn points and win the fight!

Customize your model Buy makeup, clothes, hair and more in the store. With dragcoins or diamonds.

Earn dragcoins by playing minigames and level up! Or buy diamonds to buy customizable items.
